document.full_text: takeda pharmaceutical co , japan's largest drugmaker, is buying privately held swiss rival nycomed for $13.6 billion, giving it access to a newly approved lung-disease drug, which is expected to be a major source of revenue growth.
document.title: takeda to buy swiss drugmaker nycomed for $13.6 billion
lines_and_colors: takeda pharmaceutical co , japan's largest drugmaker, is buying privately held swiss rival nycomed for $13.6 billion, giving it access to a newly approved lung-disease drug, which is expected to be a major source of revenue growth.
